Text:
Seems corrupted to me. On my ASUS O!play streaming device this one is stuck @ 0:28 minutes. 
Also, English subs are partially incorrect.
The english subs are horrible. Translated with dictionary or translation program by someone who doesn't speak english. It spoils the whole movie!

So get other subtitles from subscene.com
Also the movie isn't corrupted.Use a better player man if you want to have no problems with movies.

I'll disagree about the file.  MPEG Streamclip will not open it.  QuickTime player won't play it and Visual Hub won't convert it.
Sounds corrupted to me ...
